job_tasks.phrase: integration of advanced AI-driven features into user interfaces
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the practical implementation and embedding of AI capabilities within a software application's user interface, which is a core aspect of software development.

soft_skills.phrase: Enhance user engagement and satisfaction through the integration of advanced AI-driven features

classification.rationale: The job description is too brief and lacks sufficient technical detail to definitively classify it as a specific AI engineering role. It mentions AI features but doesn't specify the type of AI or the core engineering tasks involved.
